mapper.select: /* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListVendrInQty, 본사입고 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.INSTOCK_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS INSTOCK_DATE , B.VENDR_CD , B.VENDR_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(#{hqOfficeCd}, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.IN_TOT_QTY , B.IN_TOT FROM ( SELECT TPHVI.SLIP_NO /* 전표번호 */ , TPHVI.INSTOCK_DATE /* 입고일 */ , TPHVI.VENDR_CD /* 거래처코드 */ , (SELECT VENDR_NM FROM TB_HQ_VENDOR Z WHERE Z.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND Z.HQ_BRAND_CD = LPAD(TPHVID.HQ_BRAND_CD,7,'0') AND Z.VENDR_CD = TPHVI.VENDR_CD) AS VENDR_NM /* 거래처명 */ , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TPHVID.IN_TOT_QTY) AS IN_TOT_QTY /* 수량 */ , SUM(TPHVID.IN_TOT) AS IN_TOT /* 금액 */ FROM TB_PO_HQ_VENDR_INSTOCK TPHVI , TB_PO_HQ_VENDR_INSTOCK_DTL TPHVID , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TPHVI.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPHVI.SLIP_FG = '1' /* 입고:1, 출고:-1 */ AND TPHVI.INSTOCK_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPHVI.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPHVID.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHVI.SLIP_NO = TPHVID.SLIP_NO AND TPHVID.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHVID.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TPHVID.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TPHVID.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TPHVID.HQ_BRAND_CD , TPHVI.SLIP_NO , TPHVI.INSTOCK_DATE , TPHVI.VENDR_CD , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.SLIP_NO, B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListVendrOutQty, 업체반출 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , B.INSTOCK_DATE AS RTN_DATE , B.VENDR_CD , B.VENDR_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(#{hqOfficeCd}, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.IN_TOT_QTY , B.IN_TOT FROM ( SELECT TPHVI.SLIP_NO /* 전표번호 */ , TPHVI.INSTOCK_DATE /* 입고일 */ , TPHVI.VENDR_CD /* 거래처코드 */ , (SELECT VENDR_NM FROM TB_HQ_VENDOR Z WHERE Z.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND Z.HQ_BRAND_CD = LPAD(TPHVID.HQ_BRAND_CD,7,'0') AND Z.VENDR_CD = TPHVI.VENDR_CD) AS VENDR_NM /* 거래처명 */ , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TPHVID.IN_TOT_QTY * TPHVI.SLIP_FG) AS IN_TOT_QTY /* 수량 */ , SUM(TPHVID.IN_TOT * TPHVI.SLIP_FG) AS IN_TOT /* 금액 */ FROM TB_PO_HQ_VENDR_INSTOCK TPHVI , TB_PO_HQ_VENDR_INSTOCK_DTL TPHVID , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TPHVI.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPHVI.SLIP_FG = '-1' /* 입고:1, 출고:-1 */ AND TPHVI.INSTOCK_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPHVI.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPHVID.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHVI.SLIP_NO = TPHVID.SLIP_NO AND TPHVID.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHVID.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TPHVID.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TPHVID.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TPHVID.HQ_BRAND_CD , TPHVI.SLIP_NO , TPHVI.INSTOCK_DATE , TPHVI.VENDR_CD , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.SLIP_NO, B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListHqOutQty, 본사출고 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , B.OUT_DATE , B.STORE_CD , B.STORE_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.OUT_TOT_QTY , B.OUT_TOT FROM ( SELECT TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.OUT_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD , (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = TPHSO.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT_QTY * TPHSO.SLIP_FG) AS OUT_TOT_QTY , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT * TPHSO.SLIP_FG) AS OUT_TOT FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK TPHSO , TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK_DTL TPHSOD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPHSO.SLIP_FG = '1' AND TPHSO.SLIP_KIND = '0' AND TPHSO.PROC_FG IN ('20', '30') AND TPHSO.OUT_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSO.SLIP_NO = TPHSOD.SLIP_NO AND TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.OUT_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.SLIP_NO, B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListHqInQty, 본사반입 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , B.IN_DATE AS CARRY_IN_DATE , B.STORE_CD , B.STORE_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.OUT_TOT_QTY , B.OUT_TOT FROM ( SELECT TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.IN_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD , (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = TPHSO.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT_QTY * TPHSO.SLIP_FG) AS OUT_TOT_QTY , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT * TPHSO.SLIP_FG) AS OUT_TOT FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK TPHSO , TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK_DTL TPHSOD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPHSO.SLIP_FG = '-1' AND TPHSO.SLIP_KIND = '0' AND TPHSO.PROC_FG = '30' AND TPHSO.IN_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSO.SLIP_NO = TPHSOD.SLIP_NO AND TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.IN_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.SLIP_NO, B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListStoreMoveInQty, 매장이입 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , B.IN_CONFM_DT , B.IN_STORE_CD , B.STORE_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(B.IN_STORE_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.IN_TOT_QTY , B.IN_TOT FROM ( SELECT TPSM.SLIP_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TPSM.IN_CONFM_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IN_CONFM_DT , TPSM.IN_STORE_CD , (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = TPSM.IN_STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TPSMD.IN_TOT_QTY) AS IN_TOT_QTY , SUM(TPSMD.IN_TOT) AS IN_TOT FROM TB_PO_STORE_MOVE TPSM , TB_PO_STORE_MOVE_DTL TPSMD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TPSM.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPSM.MOVE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPSM.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPSMD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPSM.SLIP_NO = TPSMD.SLIP_NO AND TPSMD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPSMD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TPSMD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TPSMD.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TPSM.SLIP_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TPSM.IN_CONFM_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD') , TPSM.IN_STORE_CD , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.SLIP_NO, B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListStoreMoveOutQty, 매장이출 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , B.OUT_CONFM_DT , B.OUT_STORE_CD , B.STORE_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(B.OUT_STORE_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.OUT_TOT_QTY , B.OUT_TOT FROM ( SELECT TPSM.SLIP_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TPSM.OUT_CONFM_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OUT_CONFM_DT , TPSM.OUT_STORE_CD , (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = TPSM.OUT_STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TPSMD.OUT_TOT_QTY) AS OUT_TOT_QTY , SUM(TPSMD.OUT_TOT) AS OUT_TOT FROM TB_PO_STORE_MOVE TPSM , TB_PO_STORE_MOVE_DTL TPSMD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TPSM.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPSM.MOVE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPSM.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPSMD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPSM.SLIP_NO = TPSMD.SLIP_NO AND TPSMD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPSMD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TPSMD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TPSMD.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TPSM.SLIP_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TPSM.OUT_CONFM_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD') , TPSM.OUT_STORE_CD , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.SLIP_NO, B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListDisuseQty, 재고폐기 */ SELECT B.DISUSE_DATE , B.SEQ_NO , B.DISUSE_TITLE , B.PROD_FG_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(#{hqOfficeCd}, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.DISUSE_QTY , B.DISUSE_AMT FROM ( SELECT TSHD.DISUSE_DATE , TSHD.SEQ_NO , TSHD.DISUSE_TITLE , DECODE(TSHD.PROC_FG,'0','입력','확정') AS PROD_FG_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TSHDD.DISUSE_QTY) AS DISUSE_QTY , SUM(TSHDD.DISUSE_AMT) AS DISUSE_AMT FROM TB_ST_HQ_DISUSE TSHD , TB_ST_HQ_DISUSE_DTL TSHDD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TSHD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TSHD.DISUSE_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TSHD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TSHDD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHD.DISUSE_DATE = TSHDD.DISUSE_DATE AND TSHD.SEQ_NO = TSHDD.SEQ_NO AND TSHDD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHDD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TSHDD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TSHDD.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TSHD.DISUSE_DATE , TSHD.SEQ_NO , TSHD.DISUSE_TITLE , TSHD.PROC_FG , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListAdjQty, 재고조정 */ SELECT B.ADJ_DATE , B.SEQ_NO , B.ADJ_TITLE , B.PROD_FG_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(#{hqOfficeCd}, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.ADJ_QTY , B.ADJ_AMT FROM ( SELECT TSHA.ADJ_DATE , TSHA.SEQ_NO , TSHA.ADJ_TITLE , DECODE(TSHA.PROC_FG,'0','입력','확정') AS PROD_FG_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TSHAD.ADJ_QTY) AS ADJ_QTY , SUM(TSHAD.ADJ_AMT) AS ADJ_AMT FROM TB_ST_HQ_ADJUST TSHA , TB_ST_HQ_ADJUST_DTL TSHAD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TSHA.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TSHA.ADJ_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TSHA.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TSHAD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHA.ADJ_DATE = TSHAD.ADJ_DATE AND TSHA.SEQ_NO = TSHAD.SEQ_NO AND TSHAD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHAD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TSHAD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TSHAD.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TSHA.ADJ_DATE , TSHA.SEQ_NO , TSHA.ADJ_TITLE , TSHA.PROC_FG , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD UNION ALL SELECT TSHA.ACINS_DATE AS ADJ_DATE , TSHA.SEQ_NO , TSHA.ACINS_TITLE AS ADJ_TITLE , DECODE(TSHA.PROC_FG,'0','입력','확정') AS PROD_FG_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , SUM(TSHAD.ADJ_QTY) AS ADJ_QTY , SUM(TSHAD.ACINS_AMT) AS ADJ_AMT FROM TB_ST_HQ_ACTUAL_INSPECTION TSHA , TB_ST_HQ_ACTUAL_INSPECTION_DTL TSHAD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TSHA.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TSHA.ACINS_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TSHA.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TSHAD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHA.ACINS_DATE = TSHAD.ACINS_DATE AND TSHA.SEQ_NO = TSHAD.SEQ_NO AND TSHAD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHAD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TSHAD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TSHAD.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TSHA.ACINS_DATE , TSHA.SEQ_NO , TSHA.ACINS_TITLE , TSHA.PROC_FG , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.PROD_CD

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockHqInfoListSetInQty, 세트생성 */ SELECT B.SET_DATE , B.SEQ_NO , B.PROD_FG_NM , B.SET_MAKE_FG_NM , FN_GET_PROD_CLASS_CD_NM_STR(#{hqOfficeCd}, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, 'NM_STR') AS PROD_CLASS_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.COMPST_PROD_CD , B.COMPST_PROD_QTY FROM ( SELECT TSHSC.SET_DATE , TSHSC.SEQ_NO , DECODE(TSHSC.PROC_FG,'0','미처리','처리완료') AS PROD_FG_NM , DECODE(TSHSC.SET_MAKE_FG,'1','구성','2','해체') AS SET_MAKE_FG_NM , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , COMPST_PROD_CD AS COMPST_PROD_CD , SUM(TSHSCD.COMPST_PROD_QTY) AS COMPST_PROD_QTY FROM TB_ST_HQ_SETPROD_COMPOSITION TSHSC , TB_ST_HQ_SETPROD_COMPOSITION_DTL TSHSCD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD THPB WHERE TSHSC.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TSHSC.SET_DATE = #{saleDate} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TSHSC.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TSHSCD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHSC.SET_DATE = TSHSCD.SET_DATE AND TSHSC.SEQ_NO = TSHSCD.SEQ_NO AND TSHSC.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHSC.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD AND TSHSC.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THPB.HQ_OFFICE_CD(+) AND TSHSC.PROD_CD = THPB.PROD_CD(+) GROUP BY TSHSC.SET_DATE , TSHSC.SEQ_NO , TSHSC.PROC_FG , TSHSC.SET_MAKE_FG , THP.PROD_CLASS_CD , THP.PROD_CD , THP.PROD_NM , THPB.BARCD_CD , TSHSCD.COMPST_PROD_CD ) B ORDER BY B.PROD_CD
mapper.sql:
/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockStoreSelect3,12 매장입고,매장반품 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO
, B.IN_DATE AS INSTOCK_DATE
, B.IN_DATE AS CARRY_OUT_DATE
, B.HQ_OFFICE_CD , B.HQ_OFFICE_NM , A.LV1_NM , A.LV2_NM , A.LV3_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.IN_TOT_QTY , B.IN_TOT

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockStoreSelect6,18 사입입고,사입반품 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO
, B.INSTOCK_DATE
, B.INSTOCK_DATE AS RTN_DATE
, B.VENDR_CD , B.VENDR_NM , A.LV1_NM , A.LV2_NM , A.LV3_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.IN_TOT_QTY , B.IN_TOT

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockStoreSelect14 매장이입 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , B.IN_CONFM_DT , B.HQ_OFFICE_CD , B.HQ_OFFICE_NM , A.LV1_NM , A.LV2_NM , A.LV3_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.IN_TOT_QTY , B.IN_TOT

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockStoreSelect17 매장이출 */ SELECT B.SLIP_NO , B.OUT_CONFM_DT , B.HQ_OFFICE_CD , B.HQ_OFFICE_NM , A.LV1_NM , A.LV2_NM , A.LV3_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.OUT_TOT_QTY , B.OUT_TOT

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockStoreSelect21 재고폐기 */ SELECT B.DISUSE_DATE , B.SEQ_NO , B.DISUSE_TITLE AS TITLE , B.PROD_FG_NM , A.LV1_NM , A.LV2_NM , A.LV3_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.DISUSE_QTY , B.DISUSE_AMT

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockStoreSelect22 재고조정 */ SELECT B.ADJ_DATE , B.SEQ_NO , B.ADJ_TITLE AS TITLE , B.PROD_FG_NM , A.LV1_NM , A.LV2_NM , A.LV3_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.ADJ_QTY , B.ADJ_AMT

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getDailyIoStockStoreSelect19 세트생성 */ SELECT B.SET_DATE , B.SEQ_NO , B.PROD_FG_NM , B.SET_MAKE_FG_NM , A.LV1_NM , A.LV2_NM , A.LV3_NM , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_NM , B.BARCD_CD , B.COMPST_PROD_CD , B.COMPST_PROD_QTY
mapper.select:
/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getCmmProdCodeHqDtlList */ SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TSHSD.IOSTOCK_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS IO_OCCR_DT , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(VENDR_IN_QTY)) AS VENDR_IN_QTY /* 본사입고 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(VENDR_IN_TOT)) AS VENDR_IN_TOT /* 본사입고 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(VENDR_OUT_QTY)) AS VENDR_OUT_QTY /* 업체반출 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(VENDR_OUT_TOT)) AS VENDR_OUT_TOT /* 업체반출 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(HQ_OUT_QTY)) AS HQ_OUT_QTY /* 본사출고 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(HQ_OUT_TOT)) AS HQ_OUT_TOT /* 본사출고 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(HQ_IN_QTY)) AS HQ_IN_QTY /* 본사반입 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(HQ_IN_TOT)) AS HQ_IN_TOT /* 본사반입 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_MOVE_IN_QTY)) AS STORE_MOVE_IN_QTY /* 매장이입 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_MOVE_IN_TOT)) AS STORE_MOVE_IN_TOT /* 매장이입 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_MOVE_OUT_QTY)) AS STORE_MOVE_OUT_QTY /* 매장이출 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_MOVE_OUT_TOT)) AS STORE_MOVE_OUT_TOT /* 매장이출 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(DISUSE_QTY)) AS DISUSE_QTY /* 재고폐기 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(ADJ_QTY)) AS ADJ_QTY /* 재고조정 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(SET_IN_QTY)) AS SET_IN_QTY /* 세트생성 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(SALE_VENDR_ORDER_QTY)) AS SALE_VENDR_ORDER_QTY /* 거래처출고 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(SALE_VENDR_ORDER_TOT)) AS SALE_VENDR_ORDER_TOT /* 거래처출고 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(SALE_VENDR_RTN_QTY)) AS SALE_VENDR_RTN_QTY /* 거래처반품 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(SALE_VENDR_RTN_TOT)) AS SALE_VENDR_RTN_TOT /* 거래처반품 금액*/ FROM TB_ST_HQ_STOCK_DAILY TSHSD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP WHERE TSHSD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TSHSD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TSHSD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD
AND TSHSD.IOSTOCK_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND TSHSD.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} GROUP BY TSHSD.IOSTOCK_DATE ORDER BY TSHSD.IOSTOCK_DATE DESC

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getCmmProdCodeStoreDtlList */ SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TSSSD.IOSTOCK_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS IO_OCCR_DT , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_IN_QTY)) AS STORE_IN_QTY /* 매장입고 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_IN_TOT)) AS STORE_IN_TOT /* 매장입고 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_OUT_QTY)) AS STORE_OUT_QTY /* 매장반품 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_OUT_TOT)) AS STORE_OUT_TOT /* 매장반품 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(PURCHS_IN_QTY)) AS PURCHS_IN_QTY /* 사입입고 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(PURCHS_IN_TOT)) AS PURCHS_IN_TOT /* 사입입고 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(PURCHS_OUT_QTY)) AS PURCHS_OUT_QTY /* 사입반품 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(PURCHS_OUT_TOT)) AS PURCHS_OUT_TOT /* 사입반품 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_SALE_QTY)) AS STORE_SALE_QTY /* 매장판매 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(STORE_SALE_TOT)) AS STORE_SALE_TOT /* 매장판매 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(MOVE_IN_QTY)) AS MOVE_IN_QTY /* 매장이입 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(MOVE_IN_TOT)) AS MOVE_IN_TOT /* 매장이입 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(MOVE_OUT_QTY)) AS MOVE_OUT_QTY /* 매장이출 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(MOVE_OUT_TOT)) AS MOVE_OUT_TOT /* 매장이출 금액*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(DISUSE_QTY)) AS DISUSE_QTY /* 재고폐기 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(ADJ_QTY)) AS ADJ_QTY /* 재고조정 수량*/ , SF_ZERO_TO_NULL(SUM(SET_IN_QTY)) AS SET_IN_QTY /* 세트생성 수량*/ FROM TB_ST_STORE_STOCK_DAILY TSSSD , TB_MS_PRODUCT TMP WHERE TSSSD.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND TMP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TSSSD.STORE_CD = TMP.STORE_CD AND TSSSD.PROD_CD = TMP.PROD_CD
AND TSSSD.IOSTOCK_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND TSSSD.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} GROUP BY TSSSD.IOSTOCK_DATE ORDER BY TSSSD.IOSTOCK_DATE DESC

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getHqOutQtyDtlList, 본사출고 */ SELECT TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.OUT_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD
, TPHSOD.PROD_CD
, (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = TPHSO.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT_QTY) AS OUT_TOT_QTY , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT) AS OUT_TOT FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK TPHSO , TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK_DTL TPHSOD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP WHERE TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPHSO.SLIP_FG = '1' /* 주문:1, 반품:-1 */ AND TPHSO.SLIP_KIND = '0' AND TPHSO.PROC_FG IN ('20', '30') AND TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSO.SLIP_NO = TPHSOD.SLIP_NO
AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} /* 상품코드 */
AND TPHSO.OUT_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD GROUP BY TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.OUT_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD
, TPHSOD.PROD_CD
ORDER BY TPHSO.SLIP_NO, TPHSO.OUT_DATE DESC

/* USE : StockComPopupMapper.getHqInQtyDtlList, 본사반입 */ SELECT TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.IN_DATE AS CARRY_IN_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD
, TPHSOD.PROD_CD
, (SELECT STORE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE Z WHERE Z.STORE_CD = TPHSO.STORE_CD) AS STORE_NM , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT_QTY * TPHSO.SLIP_FG) AS OUT_TOT_QTY , SUM(TPHSOD.OUT_TOT * TPHSO.SLIP_FG) AS OUT_TOT FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK TPHSO , TB_PO_HQ_STORE_OUTSTOCK_DTL TPHSOD , TB_HQ_PRODUCT THP WHERE TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TPHSO.SLIP_FG = '-1' /* 주문:1, 반품:-1 */ AND TPHSO.SLIP_KIND = '0' AND TPHSO.PROC_FG = '30' AND TPHSO.HQ_OFFICE_CD = TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSO.SLIP_NO = TPHSOD.SLIP_NO
AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} /* 상품코드 */
AND TPHSO.IN_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND THP.STOCK_PROD_YN = 'Y' AND TPHSOD.HQ_OFFICE_CD = THP.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND TPHSOD.PROD_CD = THP.PROD_CD GROUP BY TPHSO.SLIP_NO , TPHSO.IN_DATE , TPHSO.STORE_CD
, TPHSOD.PROD_CD
ORDER BY TPHSO.SLIP_NO, TPHSO.IN_DATE DESC
